content.detailedDescription:
On this date i was working in a garden when i looked up and saw an aircraft. it was totally clear, no clouds and it was flying in a straight line at approx 50,000 feet, far above normal air traffic. 
   it glistened in the sun which is what drew my eyes to it, suddenly it disappeared, sort of melting into the blue sky. there were no clouds and it simply disappeared.  i continued to look in the area where i last saw it but it never re-appeared.  

  it was so high, i cannot give a description except i noticed that it had no wings. i was traveling at a normal speed gauged on the normal speed of a commercial airliner. 

   i watched as it disappeared; it was like looking in slow motion, a gradual fading into the blue background.
content.summary: Aircraft disappearing in blue sky, no clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I had just attended "leadstock" music festival with some friends, and we decided to camp outside instead of trying to drive back so late at night.  we found an area in the forest, and put out sleeping bags.  it was warm enough that we didn't need tents.

we were all four laying on the ground and looking at the sky, winding down, trying to sleep, when we saw a light come from a nearby peak.  at first we thought it was flashing, but then as it got closer we though it was zig-zagging, and then we thought that it was a stationary light and the object was barrel shaped and rolling as it made its way through the sky.

we were all very surprised.  the rest of the night there were strange flashes of light on the nearby mountain peak.
content.summary: Strange light above campsite. no noise. no running lights like an airplane. no air traffic.

content.detailedDescription:
I've never talked about this before, but always just chalked it up to something psychological that i don't understand.  i figured that i should report it though, in case it is ever useful to future researchers.

i was very young, between ten and twelve years old, and i had fallen asleep on the couch in the living room.  i do not remember the exact sequence of events, but the following occured:

- the tv went to static and woke me from the couch, so i turned it off
- the tv was off, but turned itself on and went to loud static
- there was a bright light in the backyard visible in the living room
- i woke up sprawled out on the stairs between the main floor and the second floor with no idea how i got there, i made a lot of noise - talking and maybe even shouting (i don't remember exactly, just the impression i have now) and then lost consciousness
- i woke up in my bed with no idea how i got there, and then lost consciousness

this series of events ended when i came to consciousness sitting on the toilet in the bathroom on the second floor.  i had no idea how i got there, and had total amnesia.

this was very strange, because i had memories of coming from a totally different place, on a table, in a cavern, surrounded by strange beings, who told me that i had a different name than the one i was born with.  after they released me, i returned to my body, then slid into it from the right with no memory of who the body was, or where it was.

then i picked up on the earth, i knew i was on earth, so i repeated that to myself "i am on earth".  then i got the country "i am on earth in the united states", then i got a state, city, street name, street address, first name, last name, and then recovered my full memory.

i felt very ill.  as if i had been placed in an oven and my insides cooked.  my guts and intestines felt hot to me.

the next morning, i showed no signs of illness, and went to school.  

it was a very surreal experience, and i was shaken from it for several months.  there was nobody that i could tell though, so i just figured that it was a weird dream.

it is also interesting to note that i must have moved around a lot during the night, but nobody ever woke up.



it is also worth noting that this happened one other time, but without the amnesia.  a couple of months later, i was in the cavern, on the table, surrounded by strange creatures, and then i went back into my body, which was laying in bed.  it was the middle of the night.  after i woke up, i felt very ill, again, as if my insides were heated up.  

immediately after rising from bed i observed a transparent spider crawl across my desk, which i knew wasn't real.  i didn't know what i was seeing.  about five seconds later a real spider that looked exactly like the transparent spider crawled along the exact same path, with the exact same movements as the unreal transparent spider.  i threw an object at it, and struck it, or at least struck very near to it.  i couldn't find its body, so i assume that it ran away.
content.summary: Bright light, tv disruption, nausea, waking up in strange places, amnesia, sickness

content.detailedDescription:
I remember this like it was yesterday. .. i was watching tv after finally getting my son to bed.  my husband was sleeping in his recliner about 5ft from me.  i was sitting on the couch across from a very large window.  it was about 10:30pm.  a commercial came on and i looked my husband direction to tell him i was going to bed and thats when i noticed the object.  we lived in a trailer on about 250acres.  we had at the time about 5 neighbors so it is a very rural area.  i watched the large circular object very slowly decend straight down from the sky.  it was the most beautiful bluish green that i have ever seen.  it looked to be the size of the moon...Like i was seeing the moon through the window.  the object appeared to be a light of blue but no glow came out from the object.  it looked like it was a perfect painted circle in the sky.  i continued to sit and watch the object decend and as it disappeared behind the tree tops i jumped up and yelled to my husband and asked if he had seen the object.  of course he did not he was sleeping.  i got my son from bed and made my husband drive us out on the property in the direction of the object but we did not find anything.
later as i was thinking about what happened i realized i was so mesmerized by the object, a very calm feeling not actually a feeling of being parilyzed, that i didnt say anything to my husband until it was out of site and then thats when i jumped from the couch in excitement. this was very out of character for me.
content.summary: Large blue circular object observed at night decending from sky to ground slowly

content.detailedDescription: A couple of my friends, my girlfriend and i were at my house after hanging out and having a couple beers.  we arrived at my house afterwards and i forgot my phone charger in the car.  when i was walking out to my car about 45-50 feet above me at about a 48 degree angle i saw a larger white orb of light accompanied by a smaller red orb of light directly underneath it.  traveling west it zipped about 50 feet and then disappeared right in front of my eyes.  during the event the air was electric.  as if it was filled with static electricity.  i know for a fact what i saw.  i am not sure what to do next.
content.summary: Looked up upon going out of my house to car.  one larger white light accompanied by small red light accelerated straight and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding the bus on my way to work, i was looking through the side window to watch the sky and i first noticed the craft, silver and shiny, reflecting the sunlight. it was hovering, stationary in the sky a mile or so away. i can only describe it as spoon-shaped, like a spoon i was looking at with the protruding bowl shape facing me, with a long skinny handle shaped part sticking out to the right.  i observed for at least 20 seconds before the bus turned and i lost sight, at least five seconds had passed by the time i was able to look at the same spot again, and by then it had disappeared.
content.summary: Sitting on the bus on my way to work, i observed the craft hovering, stationary in the distance

content.detailedDescription: This took place in sister lakes, michigan in the tricounty area of van buren, berrien and cass counties; in summer of 1968 or 1969.  my older sister and i were saying goodbye to our friends and were standing in our driveway. they left and we watched their car go down the road. we were babysitting our 2 younger sisters while our parents were out on a saturday night. it was past dusk, not quite completely dark.  our younger sister started yelling franticly out the door for us to look above the orchard. there was a mature cherry orchard across the street, trees about 12-15 feet tall. we looked north toward the orchard and saw a huge dark object silently floating slowly moving from north to south. it had lights or possibly windows that were lighted on the lower part that floated over us. it was so huge that it blocked out the dusky sky, and appeared black or very dark, except for the lights.It seemed at the time it was disk shaped, but it could have been cylindrical. my older sister and i made a quick plan to take our younger sisters and run to the neighbor's house down the street if the vehicle stopped.At that time there were only a couple of houses on our side of the road, spaced far apart. an orchard stretched from the corner of the highway about 1/2 mile to the church. the object continued south and we watched it for quite a few minutes, until we saw it make a jag east, then jag south, then jag east again at a very hight rate of speed and then it was gone. if we hadn't watched it for awhile, i would tend to think it could have been a blimp.
content.summary: Huge dark silent vehicle observed coming from north to south, traveled over our house. watched for several minutes until we saw it make abrupt directional change to east and  took zigzag path at right angles at extremely fast speed.

content.detailedDescription:
We were having dinner ( 7 people ) on the east side of our home and saw lights coming from the east. first was a bright smaller light. it appeared to be either hovering or coming straight at us. it then made a hard right turn and shortly after disappeared. within seconds from the same spot roughly, another light appeared but was much larger in size and was red/orange. i had a pair of binoculars right beside me so i grabbed them very quickly and focused on the object. there was no solid form and appeared as a circular fuzzy bright red/orange glow. it made a sudden change after either hovering or coming straight at us in the opposite direction of the first light being to the left and was lost over the mountain it had been traveling. this night by the way, was totally clear with no clouds in the sky at all.
a discussion followed with all of us being totally amazed with what we had seen.It was determined that they could not have been stars because of the speed that the lights were traveling. the first light we had thought could have been an aircraft with its landing lights on but there was no reason after it disappeared why we could not see any red or green flashing lights that aircraft display if it was going to an airport. the red/orange light that followed made absolutely no sense at all especially being that i had the binoculars on it.
the next two days reviled that many more people had seen the same exact lights only on the next evening in the next city about 50 km away. one of the persons had taken a picture and it was bang on what i had seen through the binoculars.
content.summary: Saw two lights, one bright white and the other red/orange hovering and making sudden changes in different directions and then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
During a vacation trip, while being taken on a boat early in the morning to a beach off coast, together with 20 other people, while taking pictures of the different scenarios, we saw an object crossing the sky without making any noise but going faster than a regular plane.

the encounter occurred too fast while being in open sea, and i guess it didn't last more than a minute, as we were heading the opposite direction. the object looked like a fireball and it caught the attention of all passangers on the boat because it was radiating an intense red-yellow light despite the morning time (9:15 am).

the object was flying fast in a straight line and several pictures were taken with different devices but only one picture was registered with whatever that was.
content.summary: During a vacation trip, while being taken on a boat to a beach off coast, a flying object appeared on the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Alright lets start with what was going on the weeks before this happened and it will all come together. my mother had finally become aware of chem trails which i had pointed out years prior only to hear her laugh at me and my conspiracy stuff. she was over the top with it in my opinion and every cloud she saw was suspect and became a lil boy cried wolf situation. i had run outside to look at what she was yelling about many times only to see stuff that wasn't anything special to me. well on april 23rd 2014 i was in my room working on music i was either making a beat or mixing a song not sure exactly but one of the two, my mom was downstairs outside our apartment taking pics of chem trails yelling and saying i have to come see this. i laughed saying nobody cares i've been telling people for years, but she persisted and got more frantic. her tone changed to where i heard the sound of my mom thinking i'm stupid and crazy if i don't believe her. so reluctantly i come outside, she says "tell me you don't see that s*** in the sky they were just bouncing all over the place" and the look on her face told me she really saw something. i look up and at first glance i didn't see them, i thought to myself that my mom had truly lost it. i say "i don't actually what the hell are you talking about mom" she stomped her foot, grabbed my hand and pointed to the south east looking over our complex. that's when i felt a feeling i've never felt before it was beautiful and scary yet weird and strange all at the same time with a bunch of relief because i am a believer. right before me were what looked like 4 stars in broad daylight, i couldn't believe it they were like mini sun's just chilling in the clear above my complex sorta in the shape of an offset square, you know like the lil dipper without it's handle. well i grabbed the binoculars from my mom cuz she couldn't find them with them and i look... that's when i was hit with a life changing moment!!! i saw what looked like a flying vimana spinning at a very fast rate and kinda wobbled like spinning a top. it looked like it was chrome i could see the sun reflecting off all it's edges and had red lights spinning in the opposite direction in the middle of it. i think that was from the speed it was spinning at kinda like seeing lug nuts on a big rig when you are driving by it on the freeway trucks wheels are moving forward but the lug nuts look like they are going backwards. thats how the red lights looked and i actually could see that they were round red lights perfectly spaced apart. without the binoculars they looked like a set of stars hanging in the sky but were slowly spreading apart. i was shocked i can't even explain the feeling that went through my body except that i felt like a kid spying on their parents and saw something i wasn't supposed to see. i dropped the binoculars and ran upstairs as fast as i could and grabbed my phone so i could document what i just saw. i watch enough alien shows to know this had to be filmed and i hoped like hell they were still there. i come back outside and they are still there, but now the formation had spread apart and the bottom right one looked like it was moving further east and moving south at the same time. the square was stretched out and looked more like a triangle and so i just started filming. zoomed in all the way on my samsung galaxy s3, i wish i could've gotten it closer to show what i saw through the binoculars. now i totally understand why ufo footage is never that great, i actually had just gotten a dslr but it was in the shop that week! not to mention you just panic and kinda lose your senses a bit, i didn't know what to do i wanted to just sit there and watch it through the binoculars since it was so amazing but i knew i had to get footage of it and all i had was my damn phone. you can hear my reaction to it and my mom in the background asking if they were still there and a bird swoops by in one of the frames towards the end that gives a good distance ratio for the pro's. the footage is shakey since it's zoomed in at parts, i'm giving the raw video and one i cleaned up and slowed down when i zoom in because it's hard to see but they are there and i'm giving both files. nobody can explain this to me and anyone i have shown was a bit tripped out. i know what i saw through binoculars i'm not sure if all 4 looked the same up close i just locked on to one since it wasn't easy and what i saw shook me to my core that lil chrome thing was just spinning so fast. as for losing sight they just spread out a lil more and faded out and disappeared. my mother and i will gladly answer any questions that come out of this, she said that they were zipping back and forth above our apartments and that is what caught her attention and then they just froze in the position that i filmed them in. not sure what else to say this has bugged me for over a year now and i just had to send it to mufon because i caught something special and i know what i saw through binoculars...
content.summary: Mom saw moving stars in broad daylight, i laughed then came out and saw them and panicked, got my phone and filmed the 4 star like lights hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I just got off of work and stopped by a friends house then i left around 5:15 a.M. and i was going home as i was approaching route 51 i noticed the light moving northeast on my left side and i watched the object move across the sky like a meteor would move only much lower and went out of sight across the horizon. (unaware of anything "burning up" through the atmosphere bluish green in color).
content.summary: Moved across the sky like a meteor but much lower

content.detailedDescription: I was viewing the vikings web cams for their new stadium, and noticed this object siting between to cranes.
content.summary: Disk or cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from daughter's graduation in illinois to my home in arkansas. just turned south on hwy 5 near mo/ar border, about 5 miles from turn saw 3 deer and what looked like a hawk run/fly in front of my vehicle. deer are common but not so much birds...Didn't think much until i went around curve into solid white lights to my right.So bright turned my head slightly away. the lights dimmed and retracted to an amazing sight! off to the right above the tree line was an enormous dark brown almost black  "metallic" sphere..As the lights faded i saw very clearly two oval areas ( one vertically over the other )on right side of sphere which was the source of light. about mid center to left of those was another oval area, light tan in color but horizontal which could've been some type of observation type window? as lights faded. i saw a "honeycomb" looking pattern within the 2 light oval areas...Just then both lights flashed on again,bottom one first then top almost simultaneously maybe half a second difference. main direction of lights was off road to my right into small wooded area but still bright enough to make me look away. saw this on off flash 3 times during my encounter..Drive by.At first i was in awe and excited with disbelief at what i am seeing, then felt a strong desire to get out of the area so sped up and continued my way home.I am not so much worried about people believing me..Just curious if anyone else has seen this same type of craft.
content.summary: Large spherical "ship" beaming 2 bright lights into wooded area from treetop level

content.detailedDescription: I was nine years old living in a secluded small village lakeside. it was like any other night i went to bed. i suddenly woke up in the middle of the night i'm guessing around 1 am. a blinding light coming through blinds like there was nothing there. it kinda sounded like a jet but i was on a bunk bed and the other kid in the room did not wake up nor did anyone else. i tried to yell and hide but i was stuck in place only able to move my eyes. next thing i remember i am face down on a bed with my face through a hole like a massage bed but made of metal. i couldn't move but there was an extreme pain at the back of my head. a cutting feeling just above where the spine is attached to the skull. i felt them put something in there it felt like the size of a piece of rice. i was then flipped over and saw grey extremely tall beings slightly larger heads, long fingers and large dark eyes. i then passed out. i then woke up in my bed naked and it was still night but hours later . my pajamas were never found and i even got in trouble for it. i never told anyone until recently when i had a few drinks i told my fiance to look at the back of my head i could still point out the spot where i felt the pain. there is a small scar exactly where i said and sometimes that area gets inflamed still. when i told her my story her face went white. it was nice to finally tell someone and confirm that there was a scar. it was also a terrifying realization for me. i also suffer frequent headaches because of the pain. i still have nightmares about it to this day.
content.summary: Bright light woke up inside craft during surgery and extreme pain

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and something said look up, so i did and there it was! i was not scared because this was ufo #20 in last 2 months that's hovered over my house. i took a picture of the ufo. it is clear as day! wow!
content.summary: Silver/white with dark shading! i was a upside down top hat!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving when i noticed the flashing lights of emergency vehicles on
the road ahead of me. suddenly a round white flashing light approached
at tree top level. it made a 90 degree turn over the grain elevator, then
hovered. it started to come at me, hovered for awhile and then disappeared
i felt i received a telepathic message that they were watching me. i am
used to seeing airplanes flying over at high altitudes at night. this was
not an airplane.
content.summary: Flashing white light, hovered, and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I lived a block from the shores of lake erie and there wasn't a wind or cloud in the sky.My wife and her friend were having a smoke on the front porch that faces the lake... she told me to come outside to see something..I went outside and this orange red ball was floating across the sky from the lake to on land right between my house and neighbours house and right over and gone..I was amazed..But i stayed outside and i seen another one coming so i grabbed my phone and recorded it..My phoned died right after that..Low batt...3 more came across after that...No sound no anything..All the same line they followed..They were an orange red ball just floating across the sky....All happened in about 8 to 10 min...I know it wasn't any planes cause the buffalo airport is the other way and the planes fly low over our house when landing in buffalo..Do think it was chinese lanterns either cause they flicker from the candle and are not up that high in the air...6 years ago my neighbour i seen weird lights while fishing at night in my boat around the same time...Ive been looking at the skys ever since..I will send the video
content.summary: Orbs coming arcoss lake erie

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from local convenient store at 9:46 pm, i was on the phone with my daughter and noticed what looked like 2 big, bright stars in the sky, one seemed much brighter than the other, there was a gap between them and they were side by side and at one point i thought there was something in between them.  as i turned onto my road heading home i noticed the star like light on the left seemed bigger and brighter.  if the objects were moving they were so slight that i could hardly tell.  there was nothing else viewable in the sky, no clouds, no other stars and no aircraft.  the only reason i lost sight of it was because i arrived at home and tried to return to my conversation that i had started earlier on the phone.
content.summary: Bright star like lights, western pa

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at a retail store, just me and my coworker in there at the time. i was looked out the window seeing how far away the thunderstorm was. the windows in my store are two story high and facing east. it was almost 7pm when i seen a perfectly rectangular, sharp 90 edges, very shiny silver craft, about 8in in length, 5in in width, 5in in hight from my point of view. fly over my store heading towards the area of pyramid lake, n.E. direction. it was below the scarred thunderstorm clouds, the wind and storm was going n.W. and had mostly already passed and was about 5 miles away. me and my coworker watched the thing travel in a straight line for about 4 or 5 min untill it was the size of grain of rice when it went into clouds and we lost sight of it. the sides of it were extremely shiny but looked like they were textured, there were absolutely no wings, lights or anything normal, cuboid shaped silver flying box. it didnt move around in the wind, stayed on a straight path. we were inside so we didn't hear any noise. we were shaken up afterwards. fallon air base is not far and we regularly have military flying overhead. this was not anything i have ever seen before in my 41 years.
content.summary: Seen rectangular cube shaped, bright silver, craft fly overhead, watched 5min until it went behind stormclouds

content.detailedDescription: Driving home one cloudless night as a passenger we saw the stars black out from my right side (horizon) moving to directly above us. what got my attention was a darkness, the stars where blocked for just a split second as it moved from the right. then this triangle thing stopped in an instant above us blocking out the stars in a perfect triangle now moving the speed of the car, i saw stars disappearing on the leading side of it and stars repairing behind it. after about 30-40 seconds of this thing directly over us it shot to the left, just blocking out those stars as fast s when it came in. the driver and i only talked about it one time several days later.  the whole thing still bugs me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Just a large perfect triangle shape, blackish? it simply blocked out the stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the palmer wasilla hwy past hemmer rd when i first spotted the suspended large cube above the tree line. as i was driving trees would be in the way and i couldn't just stop to look some more so i was trying to find a parking area where i could watch it. it was so obviously large that i know other people for sure would've seen it as well. i did get a really good look but was limited because i was driving. it was so mysterious looking and out of place and was not shiny at all. i could not get a place to park and observe fast enough and the trees were too tall to see it where i could finally park which was at carrs grocery store. i have seen ufos before and this was the most bizarre site to see.
content.summary: Perfectly still and large, was rust and grey colored. earthy colored, was very bizarre just sitting above the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
To the west of our house ( by the mines), three flashes of light happened with no sound. we were on our back porch and we both happened to turn our head at the same time when there was these 3 huge flashes of light. after the flashes stopped, whatever it was disappeared. 
my husband and i jumped on the computer to see if anyone else saw what we saw and no one did.
content.summary: West of our house, three bright lights flashed really bright over the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work traveling west on mt zion rd when i saw an orange light flying what seemed along side the road. i noticed it around the 400 block of mt. zion rd. it was pretty high in the sky but not as high as a plane would be. that struck me as odd. i live near an airport and i see a lot of planes and helicopters. i noticed this light or orb because it had no blinking lights. i don't know how to explain it but it just kind of flew more smooth. it was just weird. i pulled out my cell phone and got a video of it but i was driving 20-25 mph and watching the road not the object so i could be safe. i stopped at a red light and found the object and recorded it. i have a 0:40 video of it but i had to trim 0:09 of the video to make it 0:31 and use a video compressing app on my phone to be able to attach the video to an email so that i can upload and save it to my desktop so i can upload it to this tool. i also uploaded it on my facebook page and tagged mufon the object didn't make a sound but i will say that there were obviously cars driving around me so its possible that any sound was drowned out and i couldn't hear it. i was heading home so i was trying to keep an eye on it and get to where i could stop my car. i finally turned left into florence baptist church and got out of my car and watched it. by now i had stopped recording as my phone isn't the best quality and i was having trouble seeing it. as i watched it seemed like it was flying and one second i see the light as plain as could and then its gone. it didn't fly behind anything it just seemed like it wasn't there. maybe turned its lights off or something. it just disappeared. the whole time i watched the object there were never any lights blinking. it was moving pretty fast because from the time i first saw it to when it disappeared was maybe 3 mins and it covered a lot of ground in that time. it was 70 degrees and humid outside with no breeze. i am using the temp gauge on my car for that info and i drove back to where i first saw it to get the exact location (400 block of mt zion road) and i looked at the clock.
content.summary: Saw orange orb flying and nothing was blinking, it just disappeared after a while

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting outside of my house eating and enjoying the cool breeze looking out in the distance over the house in front of us when i noticed a star like object begin to move. i quickly motioned over to her telling her to check this out pointing out in the distance we both noticed it starting to move and get brighter, at one point it look like it flashed a beam of light straight out in our direction, then the light started to them and it look like it was moving slightly to the right before it dimmed and started to fade away. the entire incident took about 2 minute and 10 seconds. notable features of the object  we're that after the light moving to the right it had a very dim read glow until we couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Starlight object

content.detailedDescription: Weird reminds me of a dude holding a giant machine a cross a tshape a pipe shape and an l shape it wasnt me it was my sister she was driving and her friend took a picture of the sky being goofy and this thing appeared they thought it was a sword or soemthing they drove away thats how they lost sight of it
content.summary: Very strange

content.detailedDescription: I was about 17 and i was outside late at night and a hugh ball of light came and hovered over me. a smaller ball of light came out and circled around my body for a few seconds. after that it flew off and the larger one followed it. they were gone in a flash. i don't remember noise or anything. i couldn't make out any details it was so bright. like a star. since then i have been having weird things happening. that's why i'm making the report now. i'm waking up with marks on my body and sore spots. i have ringing in my ears and i wake up in places i didn't fall asleep. some lost time as well. i'm rh negative and i researched it and found that aliens are interested in people with the rh negative blood. i'm starting to get scared.
content.summary: A huge ball of light came and hovered over me, a smaller ball of light came out and circled around me then they flew off in a flash.

content.detailedDescription: On 10-21-2014, a big storm passed through our area and i went out into the street to take pictures of the lightning. i took a series of pictures and this object showed up in one picture. i have pictures just before and after, not showing it. i never noticed it, until i downloaded my pictures onto my computer. at first i thought it might be a big bird or possibly a balloon, not sure. this is why i decided to send it to you. it's definitely round or either a sphere, with two black spots across from each other and you can determine what it might be.
content.summary: While out in front of my house taking pictures of lightning, i noticed this object in one picture

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my brother were sitting watching tv and my brother said hey i think a helicopter is going to the hospital, so we both went out on or our deck to see if it was a helicopter, usually when they go to the hospital you can hear them, and they fly really low.

  well the large orange light was perfectly silent, and kept going on its east to west pattern.  we both thought it was strange as it made no noise whatsoever, and had no blinking lights like a helicopter would.

  to our amazement about 3 mins later another light followed.  at this point we woke our dad up and told him hey like 3 ufos just flew over.  he came outside so we could have another witness.

  about 6 orange lights flew over equally spaced about 3mins apart.  the last time it flew over it was a pair of 2 orange lights.  they were spaced apart and maintained the same speed.  i would guess about 1kmph to 1.5kmph.  each of the lights took the same flight path, and had the same speed.  the lights did not get brighter or dimmer at any time.  none of the lights had additional bliking lights that would mark it as a jet or airplane.

if you have seen this as well or have any questions please feel free to email me

i left size and distance as unknown because at night it is impossible to tell how far anything is away or how big it is!
content.summary: 8 orange lights moving east to west

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside to look at fireworks. i was watching neighbors down the street due south. turned toward driveway (n). looked up and saw object. watched for 20 seconds thinking it was rotor or fixed wing aircraft as we are in ft. campbell, ky flightpath and also within 4 statute miles of lifeflight helo base, but, being ex-military, i know the marker lights were not right for know aircraft types. i thought it might also be a drone, but it appeared to be too high and too large. it also was extremely stable in 'hover'. there was no wavering whatsoever. even helicopters move a little when they hover for extended periods.  i continued to watch for about 30 seconds more before calling my wife outside. when she arrived object was still stationary and exactly where i first saw it. to me, it appeared with two evenly sized and spaced red lights, blinking green light on left end, i saw blinking white (silver) light behind the two red lights. using letters to code the light colors, it looked like this to me:
                         w/s
                     gr r    r


my wife saw          gr
                      r
                      r

the object revolved at least once during the hover as i could tell the green light disappeared behind the craft's body (i assume). it was dark, and very overcast at the time.  thunderstorms and lightning were in the area to the nw and ne some miles distant. the object moved rapidly w then stopped. it then return e to it's original position (as near as we could tell). it stopped for about 5 seconds, then accelerated rapidly due n. we could not tell it it was loosing altitude as it moved off into the distance or went behind cloud cover. it could not have been a fixed wing aircraft. if it were rotary wing, it was faster than any helicopter i've ever experienced and we should have heard some kind of sound for such drastic maneuvering. we did not have our phones or a camera on our persons at the time. i can easily sketch what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Wife and i witnessed object with 2 red, 1 flashing gree, 1 flashing silver lights. hovered, then moved w briefly, then hovered, then moved back to original position, then rapidly flew due north, all at same altitude. flew out of sight. duration 5 min

content.detailedDescription: I saw this walking south to my house from my friend's house along 35th avenue in between 110th and 120th. it was 12:55 pm. i noticed it to my right and the circular pattern really had me intrigued. it was stationary and i thought that it couldn't be just a street lamp because of the strange collection of lights. i knew there was an athletic field behind it and a school, but not necessarily in the exact area as the light. regardless, the lights wouldn't have been being used at 1 am and they don't have such a curious pattern. at first i thought it was a street lamp, but then i thought that it was too high to be a lamp once i approached and got different angles. i was scared because it was pretty late and my first thought after examining it was that it was a ufo. it was still there after i left.
content.summary: Saw odd collection of light at 1 am on my way home.
